dct_description_sm: Possibly reissued in Ester Low’s (wife) edition from 1810.
Sheet showing numerous projections. The polar projection, labeled “Fig. 4.” in the bottom left-hand corner depicts California as an island.
Engraved for the Encyclopaedia, Published in N. York. (lower middle).

Issued in his: The new and complete American encyclopaedia: or, universal dictionary of arts and sciences ... Vol. IV. ..., New York : Printed and Published by John Low, 1808. (Volumes printed between 1805-1811).
Sabin 52441; Rumsey Collection; Meridian article by Mary Ritzlin, No. 2, 1989.
